Feature Notes:

Enter Building: May enter any freehold, palace, or temple within home city

Make Accusation: May accuse freeman or noble of crime within home city
Pass Judgment: May pass judgment on slave, freeman, or noble within home city
Requisition Soldiers: Can call upon 20d4 soldiers within home city
